name: Young Justice Season 1
name_cn: 少年正义联盟 第一季
summary:
Young Justice focuses on the lives of a group of teenaged superhero sidekicks and protégés attempting to establish themselves as proven superheroes and as teenagers dealing with adolescent issues grounded in the context of their personal lives.
The show is set in Earth-16, a DC Multiverse world, and corresponds to the present time of our world — a time period Vietti has called "a new age of heroes."
info:
• 中文名: 少年正义联盟 第一季
  • 话数: 26
  • 放送开始: 2011年1月7日
  • 原作: Greg Weisman, Brandon Vietti、DC Comics
  • 脚本: Greg Weisman
  • 分镜: Sam Liu
  • 背景美术: Sam Liu
  • 制作: Warner Bros. Entertainment, Inc
  • 动画制作: Warner Bros. Animation
  • 官方网站: http://www.cartoonnetwork.com/tv_shows/youngjustice/index.html
  • 播放电视台: Cartoon Network

eps.name: Independence Day
eps.desc: Three teenage sidekicks decide to investigate a fire at a genetics laboratory... and discover a plot to create a clone of Superman.

eps.name: Fireworks (Independence Day, Part 2)
eps.desc: Robin, Kid Flash, and Aqualad are captured and only Superboy, the telepathically controlled clone of Superman, can free them. As they struggle to reach the surface, they must do battle with the transformed scientist known as Blockbuster.

eps.name: Welcome to Happy Harbor
eps.desc: Batman has yet to assign the team a mission, and the team grows restless. A fire at a nearby power plant is the team's first mission or is it just a test?

eps.name: Drop-Zone
eps.desc: Batman sends the team on its first official mission - to observe and report on a Venom Factory. The team chooses its leader.

eps.name: Schooled
eps.desc: Young Justice is assigned transport duty. To deliver parts of an android that has duplicated the powers of several Justice Leaguers. The creator of the android wants him back.

eps.name: Infiltrator
eps.desc: Roy rescues a scientist from the League of Shadows. He asks Young Justice to protect her and neutralize the weapon that she was working on. Artemis joins the team.

eps.name: Denial
eps.desc: When the team investigates the disappearance of Kent Nelson (formerly Doctor Fate), the scientific-minded Wally West is forced to confront his disbelief in magic while battling Abra Kadabra and Klarion the Witch Boy for the ultra-powerful helmet of fate.

eps.name: Downtime
eps.desc: After a poor performance during a mission, Batman gives the team some time off. Aqualad considers going back to Atlantis.

eps.name: Bereft
eps.desc: The team awakens in the Biaylan desert with amnesia. Miss Martian tries to unite the team to restore their memories, and must find the cause of their amnesia.

eps.name: Targets
eps.desc: Red Arrow has to protect one villain from another in order to ensure that peace talks between two warring nations go well.

eps.name: Terrors
eps.desc: Batman assigns Superboy and Miss Martian to go undercover inside Belle Reve, a federal prison designed to house the world's worst super-villains.

eps.name: Home Front
eps.desc: When the cave is attacked, can Artemis and Robin - the two teens without super-powers - save the Team (or even themselves) from the unknown invaders?

eps.name: Alpha Male
eps.desc: When Batman sends the Team and new "den-mother" Captain Marvel to India to investigate bizarre reports of armed animals attacking human beings, can Aqualad pull his fractured Team together?

eps.name: Revelation
eps.desc: Batman assigns the Team to battle the Injustice League, when plant creatures they control begin a global assault.

eps.name: Humanity
eps.desc: The Team is on the hunt for Red Tornado, and their friend Zatanna wants to come along for the ride.

eps.name: Disordered
eps.desc: Superboy's "Sphere" goes through a surprising change, revealing a connection to the forever people of New Genesis.

eps.name: Secret
eps.desc: It's Halloween. Artemis and Zatanna are in Manhattan for a girls' night out. There, they encounter the deadly Harm, who has a secret.

eps.name: Misplaced
eps.desc: When Earth's 5 most powerful sorcerers make all the adults on the planet disappear, it's up to the Team, Zatanna, and Billy Batson to stop them.

eps.name: Coldhearted
eps.desc: On his birthday, Kid Flash must deliver a transplant heart in a race against time, artificial extreme weather conditions and supervillain opposition.

eps.name: Image
eps.desc: A covert operation against Queen Bee in Qurac forces Miss Martian to finally face her greatest fears and her biggest secrets. But will she reveal those secrets to her friends - or allow what she's hiding to take down the entire team?

eps.name: Agendas
eps.desc: Superboy returns to Project Cadmus, where he learns the top-secret genetics lab may have created another Super-clone...

eps.name: Insecurity
eps.desc: Red Arrow's return undercuts Artemis' confidence, while the team's mission to track down Sportsmaster threatens to expose her darkest secrets.

eps.name: Performance
eps.desc: Robin, Artemis, Superboy, Miss Martian, and Red Arrow go undercover as the Daring Dangers to discover the link between Haly's circus and stolen weapon technology.

eps.name: Usual Suspects
eps.desc: The team gets a new member and a new mission - a mission that may finally expose all of the team's secrets ... and all of their lies!

eps.name: Auld Acquaintance
eps.desc: The team finally learns the identity of the traitor in their midst, forcing a battle against an enemy more dangerous than any they've ever faced before!

relations.title: Justice League: Crisis On Two Earths

like.name: 生活大爆炸 第四季
